text: What Can Not Be Forgiven (Spanish: Lo que no se puede perdonar!..) is a 1953 Mexican drama film directed by Roberto Rodríguez and starring María Elena Marqués, Armando Calvo and Domingo Soler.Amador p.134 ==Cast== * María Elena Marqués as Hortensia * Armando Calvo as Jorge del Río * Domingo Soler as Don Javier * Emperatriz Carvajal as Rita * Salvador Quiroz as Doctor * Conchita Gentil Arcos as Nana Rafaela * Héctor Godoy as Gerardo * Cecilia Leger as Reverenda madre * León Barroso as Pepe * Manuel Casanueva as Cobrador de cuentas * Lupe del Castillo as Abortista * María Gentil Arcos as Hermana religiosa * Miguel Ángel López as Hombre en lago * Blanca Marroquín as Sirvienta * Ignacio Peón as Hombre en aeropuerto * Carlos Robles Gil as Hombre en baile * Manuel Trejo Morales as Empleado banco * Guillermo Álvarez Bianchi as Mesero == References == == Bibliography == * María Luisa Amador. Cartelera cinematográfica, 1950-1959. UNAM, 1985. == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:1953 drama films Category:Mexican drama films Category:Mexican films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films directed by Roberto Rodríguez
title: What Can Not Be Forgiven
